sentence: Mr  Netanyahu  has  been  resisting  pressure  to  accept  a  proposed  ceasefire  deal  that  would  allow  an  exchange  of  the  remaining  116  hostages,  44  of  whom  are  believed  to  be  dead,  for  Palestinian  prisoners.
